DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the prevalence of characteristics of pain in a cohort of patients with prior stroke suspected of having central post stroke pain, identified through a postal questionnaire.
DOC.brief_title: Pain After Stroke, Part 2: Clinical Characteristics and Classification of Pain in Patients After Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: Medical history, pain history, pain drawing, DN4, sensory examination.
DOC.criteria: Possible neuropathic pain following stroke Severe dementia Severe language barriers Patients who cannot cooperate
